title: A high-spin s-triazine linked fluorenyl radical polymer
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,16945-16950
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03034F, Paper

Hoa Phan, Tun Seng Herng, Hou Xudong, Linh Khanh Nguyen, Vinh The La, Chinh Dang Huynh, Jun Ding, Jishan Wu
The syntheses of high-spin organic polymers have been a daunting task due to the highly reactive nature of organic radicals, especially when they are ferromagnetically coupled.
